title: WELCOME TO BRONZE COACH
body:
https://i.imgflip.com/3799vj.jpg

https://i.imgflip.com/379a19.jpg

https://i.imgflip.com/379a55.jpg

https://i.imgflip.com/379a8z.jpg

WELCOME TO BRONZE COACH

**WHERE YOU CAN ASK FOR ALL THE LATEST ADVICE ON TROLL PICKS, NEW BIG BRAIN META DEFINING STRATS THAT FOR SOME REASON PROS AREN'T PLAYING, WHAT ARE YOU DOING SO BRONZE THAT YOUR NOT BRONZE ENOUGH TO UNBRONZE YOURSELF HARDER, AND I'LL EVEN TRY TO ANSWER THE IMPOSSIBLE QUESTIONS LIKE "WHEN WILL ORNN GET A SKIN"**

WELCOME TO BRONZE COACH ROUND ONE
FEEL FREE TO ASK THE BRONZE COACH QUESTIONS NO MATTER WHAT RANK YOU ARE, JUST REMEMBER THE COACH IS BRONZE AND DOES NOT ACCEPT RESPONSIBILITY FOR ANY LOSS OF LP OR DUMPSTER FIRES THAT MAY OCCUR AFTER USE OF OUR SERVICE

replies.body: I have found myself in Bronze 4 after my placement games, despite being silver+ in every previous season and queue. How do i successfully blame the system and/or other players for this event?

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kZhTXvEr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-08-05T02:05:47.676+0000)
>
> I have found myself in Bronze 4 after my placement games, despite being silver+ in every previous season and queue. How do i successfully blame the system and/or other players for this event?

Okay so the first thing u want to do is go on all the social media platforms that riot is a part of and post 
#RiggedSystemNerfPyke
That way players will feel sympathy for you and rebel against riot remembering that the balance team is obviously the flaw in the system and in no way are you responsible because you are a top tier player
That sounds like a lot of work, can i just spam my gold season ward and mastery 7?

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kZhTXvEr,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-05T02:18:13.617+0000)
>
> That sounds like a lot of work, can i just spam my gold season ward and mastery 7?

Along with the blitzcrank ? emote 
https://i.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/original/000/027/581/strange.jpg
I have that permanently slotted, good to know i am doing something right.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kZhTXvEr,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-05T02:35:16.308+0000)

> I have that permanently slotted, good to know i am doing something right.

**claps**
What's the most optimal way to play yuumi jungle? Ty for your coaching

> What's the most optimal way to play yuumi jungle? Ty for your coaching

Get a Yi to duo, and reverse funnel into Yuumi {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:14}}  and yi gets {{summoner:11}} {{summoner:4}}

>

Cool cool, the duo smite action is a great idea to guarantee dragon and baron steals/ secures. I'm trying this in my next ranked game

> [{quoted}](name=ThisName1sDumb,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kZhTXvEr,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2019-08-05T04:40:19.798+0000)
>
> Cool cool, the duo smite action is a great idea to guarantee dragon and baron steals/ secures. I'm trying this in my next ranked game

remember the yi is your servant so if you need a way out and he has no flash tell him to go to a skinny wall and w off of him over it, its a high skill thing that not everyone can do but HE SHOULD BE WILLING TO DIE FOR HIS CARRY

> [{quoted}](name=CaptainAntiHeroz,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kZhTXvEr,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-05T04:43:02.501+0000)

Of course, of course. And what kind of items should a jungle Yuumi build?

> [{quoted}](name=ThisName1sDumb,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=kZhTXvEr,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2019-08-05T05:05:21.204+0000)
>
> Of course, of course. And what kind of items should a jungle Yuumi build?

{{item:1402}} {{item:3161}} {{item:3905}} {{item:3089}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3102}} 

the banshees makes sure once your super minion dies you cant get caught :D
also if your yi bails you can always buy {{item:3085}}  or {{item:3068}}  instead of spear, its just spear is an op item so if u like to hop off your yi or he alpha strikes and you get the chance to spam why not?
for a full ap build drop the spear and take {{item:3157}}  for those times where your yi will do yi things
